title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mount Fuji, Japan
content:
Photo submitted by Tony Levecchia, “…a pic of my Fuji bike in Fujisawa Japan, with Mt Fuji in the background on a beautiful December day.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mount Fuji, Japan appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
